extension.name: CKEditor
extension.description: Includes CKEditor, a web-based XHTML editor developed by Frederico Knabben. It also has an integrated file browser which uses Symphony sections to get it's files from.

releases.release: - Fix for SQL error found by @Timurrrcheg (https://gitter.im/symphonycms/symphony-2 Oct 10 2020 19:15)
- Updated to CKEditor 4.0.1.1 - Added templates for toolbars - Fixed link templates + page links (got accidentally deleted in previous update)
